components.summary:
Peekapak is a social-emotional learning company that creates curriculumns for teachers. A teacher is able to log in and open lesson plans that include story books, discussion questions, in-class assignments and home activities.

My primary contribution to the company was implementing lessons for newly added grades. Previously the company provided curriculumns up to Grade 3, but had recently expanded to include Grades 4 and 5. Aside from creating and editing JSON files, the website had to be updated to allow teachers to create new classrooms and to view the new content.

Once all available lessons were uploaded, I worked on the Publisher, which allows content-creaters to make the lessons without a developer. ~90% functionality was tested successfully and was able to upload majority of content.
Publisher functions include:
  • Undo/Redo stack
  • Rich text editing
  • Creates and deletes sections of a list
  • Preview
  • Load content from database
  • Saves and publishes content to database
